title: Android 10 hard reset and restore from backup does not restore any home screens or wallpapers?
content:
Hard reset / restore from backup / support just says its a bug and that I have to re-create all my home screens. 
Not really a workable solution considering that I have to do a hard reset every six months to keep the phone from getting laggy...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
